mapper.select: select r.reply_num,r.user_num,m.id, m.profile_picture, r.reply_content, r.reply_date from reply r,member m where r.user_num = m.user_num and review_num=#{review_num} order by reply_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into reply(reply_num, user_num, review_num, reply_content, reply_date, reply_alarm) values(reply_seq.nextval, #{user_num}, #{review_num}, #{reply_content}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: select rp.user_num, rp.reply_num, m.profile_picture, m.id from reply rp, review rv, member m where rp.review_num=rv.review_num and rp.user_num=m.user_num and rv.user_num=#{user_num} and rp.reply_alarm=0
mapper.update: update reply set reply_alarm=1 where reply_num=#{reply_num}
mapper.select: select count(user_num) from reply where review_num=#{review_num}
mapper.update: update review set reply_count = reply_count+1 where review_num=#{review_num}
update review set reply_count = reply_count-1 where review_num=#{review_num}
